loader.descNovedad1: Resist the temptation to eat it or you won't be able to open it on Easter! Contains an exclusive item.
loader.descNovedad2: You'll get 2 Space Eggs for this price; give one to a friend and connect both your islands!
loader.descNovedad3: Sir Harvey and his family will join us this Easter in BoomBang!.
loader.descNovedad4: Some people call it noise. We think it's art.
loader.descNovedad5: Ice eggs are back: this time with new creatures inside!
loader.descNovedad6: Baby bunny|So cute you just won't stop hugging him

chooseScene.problemasClaves: Due to problems, some codes haven't worked; you can now activate these codes as usual!

fichaUnderAge.underAgeText0: Your parent will have to click on the link we have sent|to your email in order to complete|your validation. It can|take few minutes.
fichaUnderAge.underAgeText1: If you don't receive the email|with the link, try this:
fichaUnderAge.underAgeText3: Add this address to your contacts|noreply@boombang.tv|We will send you Boombang's|emails from this address.
fichaUnderAge.underAgeText4: Take a Boombang's old email and and press|'Mark as safe'
fichaUnderAge.underAgeText5: If you don't find it, we|can send it to you again

fichaTips.tip0: Never tell anyone your real name, home address, telephone number or email address.
fichaTips.tip1: A real Moderator will NEVER ask for your MSN or account password
fichaTips.tip2: It is not possible to clone or duplicate items, anyone claiming he can, is only trying to scam you.
fichaTips.tip3: Never write your password in an unknown website. You will not get free credits and may end up hacked.
fichaTips.tip4: Keep your email and msn a secret: never tell them to anybody, you risk losing your account and items forever!
fichaTips.tip5: Never accept supposedly "valid codes" in exchange of your items, you'll end up tricked.
fichaTips.tip6: How to identify a real MOD: MOD's have a yellow panel portrait and also chat with a yellow color.
fichaTips.tipNewT0: "Keep your email a secret, that way your BoomBang account will be safe"
fichaTips.tipNewd1_0: Create a new email just for BoomBang, and don't tell anyone about it
fichaTips.tipNewd2_0: If you use MSN, make sure you don't use your BoomBang email
fichaTips.tipNewd3_0: If somebody wants to know your email you can report him!
fichaTips.tipNewT1: "Webpages explaining how to get free items or Credits are all FAKE"
fichaTips.tipNewd1_1: Those webpages are fake and created by by scammers to hack your account
fichaTips.tipNewd2_1: They will ask for your email and password to steal your account
fichaTips.tipNewd3_1: Never write your email and password in another website!
fichaTips.tipNewT2: "Never download programs or clic on suspicious links"
fichaTips.tipNewd1_2: Many scammers create programs and links so you clic and they can hack you
fichaTips.tipNewd2_2: Those programs and links you download have a virus
fichaTips.tipNewd3_2: The scammer can see all your account information with that virus
fichaTips.tipNewT3: "Many players claim to be real Moderators to steal your account"
fichaTips.tipNewd1_3: A true MOD has a yellow panel when you select him
fichaTips.tipNewd2_3: A true MOD may only chat and talk with a yellow color text
fichaTips.tipNewd3_3: A true MOD will never ask you for your email or password!
fichaTips.tipNewT4: "Never tell other players your real name or where you live"
fichaTips.tipNewd1_4: It is always better to be cautious and never tell anyone about yourself
fichaTips.tipNewd2_4: You don't need to ask or share that information to have fun in BoomBang
fichaTips.tipNewd3_4: If a player insists or harasses you can always report him

fichaMarketingViral.texto1: Invite your friends to BoomBang! You will have fun together and you'll get some free Credits!
fichaMarketingViral.texto2: This is how it works: each time the friend you invite buys credits, you will receive a 10% of the total nº of Credits he has purchased! For free!
fichaMarketingViral.texto3: This panel indicates the number of friends that have registered thanks to your invitation!
fichaMarketingViral.enviarPostal: Send a postcard to your friends!|You can invite up to 5 each day.

fichaMarketingViral.invitacionesEnviadasLimite: <FONT COLOR="#009999">You have reached the daily limit of invitations! Send more tomorrow</FONT>
fichaMarketingViral.emailRepetido: You have already invited this friend

fichaValidarEmailAlta.titulo: Welcome to BoomBang! Protect your account:
fichaValidarEmailAlta.validar1: We need a valid email for your BoomBang account
fichaValidarEmailAlta.validar2: We will use this email to get in touch with you from now on (send your password, etc)
fichaValidarEmailAlta.eresMenor1: If you are not yet 14 years old, we will require your parents consent to store your email in BoomBang.
fichaValidarEmailAlta.eresMenor2: Please tell them to write an email to: parents@boombang.tv
fichaValidarEmailAlta.completarFecha: We need all your Birthday details!

fichaBaneos.mensajeBaneo: Our moderators have temporarily forbidden your access to BoomBang
fichaBaneos.tip2Baneo: Time left until you can play again
fichaBaneos.mensajeNoSePudoConectar: It seems there is a problem and you can't connect to BoomBang. This might be caused by:
fichaBaneos.tip1NoSePudoConectar: You are trying to play through a Proxy
fichaBaneos.tip2NoSePudoConectar: A firewall on your computer blocking BoomBang. Make sure you allow both inbound and outbound traffic.
fichaBaneos.tip3NoSePudoConectar: Don't download music or games while trying to connect
fichaBaneos.mensaje2NoSePudoConectar: We suggest you to contact your network administrator or the person who installed your computer to help you.
fichaBaneos.mensajeMultiplesConexiones: We have detected another account trying to log in from this computer. For security reasons this account has been disconnected.
fichaBaneos.tip1MultiplesConexiones: Please remember: you can have and create as many accounts as you like, but you can only play with one at any given time.
fichaBaneos.mensajeMantenimiento: BoomBang is currently under maintenance. Please check back in a few minutes.
fichaBaneos.mensajeConexionPerdida: This might happen if your computer is slow, or internet connection weak. We suggest that you stop downloading any files while playing (like other games or music) and close any other programs. This will improve performance.||Close this browser window and try connecting again www.boombang.tv
fichaBaneos.mensajeUrlOficial: Hi, visit the official website www.boombang.tv to play and create your account in this virtual world!
fichaBaneos.mensajeGuestTiempoLimite: We have reached our maximun number of players, please try to enter again in a few minutes.
fichaBaneos.mensajeGuestError: An error ocurred, please try to enter again in a few minutes.

fichaConcurso.descripcion13: We prefer candy and sweets to garlic xD The higher the nº of garlics you destroy the better your reward will be!|You have my word.
fichaConcurso.descripcion14: We still don't know who dared capture the fairies! Fairies carry tiny magic particles on their wings..|Perhaps somebody wants to ban magic from BoomBang forever?
fichaConcurso.descripcion25: Los objetos PSU desaparecerán al acabar el concurso.
fichaConcurso.descripcion44: Capture all the 36 bits and rebuild the mythical White Egg, an adventure just a few will be able to finish. Will you?
fichaConcurso.descripcion80: Get ready and participate in the World Cup to become the Top Scorer! The more goals the higher the chance to win the World Cup!
fichaConcurso.descripcion106: Capture all the ghost as you can! Help Crastin ghost to find the ghosts that scaped from the cemetery!
fichaConcurso.descripcion111: Santa is searching for his most hardworking assistant: collect as many christmas hats as you can to prove that you are precisely the one he is looking for!
fichaConcurso.descripcion116: Centuries ago dinosaurs roamed around BoomBang freely.||The search has started: recollect the bones and build them once more!

fichaPromocion.descripcion: We want to celebrate 2009 with a very special promotion:||Purchase Credits using your <FONT COLOR="#007A5B">Credit Card</FONT> and get DOUBLE the number of Credits for the same price!||What are you waiting for!?|Its only available during this week!

fichaPromocionMascota.descripcion: BoomBang celebrates its 5th Anniversary and this promotion is only the beginning!

fichaTelefonoCancelado.comentarioChile: Purchase with Phone / SMS to Chile has been blocked.
fichaTelefonoCancelado.descripcionChile: From now on you can only buy with your Credit Card Prepaid located at Blockbuster, Panini and Feria de Disco.
fichaTelefonoCancelado.comentarioVenezuela: Phone and SMS purchases from Venezuela have been blocked.
fichaTelefonoCancelado.descripcionVenezuela: You can now buy your Credits using a Credit Card or with Western Union via Paybycash

fichaTelefonoNoFunciona.descripcion: Attention: the number 94444 used by players in USA to purchase Credits with their cellphones is currently not working.||The service will be shut down for some days. Please don't send any text message as we can't guarantee it will work.||We are working on a solution and will let you know when everything is fixed again.|Thanks!

fichaTelefonoNuevo.descripcion: Players from USA may once again purchase Credits with their Telephones!||Dial <FONT SIZE="+2">1900 868 2220</FONT> with your home Telephone, hold the line and write down your Code.||The cost is $7 and you get 10,000 Credits!|This is a special promotion!
fichaTelefonoNuevo.descripcion2: This Service will ONLY work for normal home phone Telephones (NOT Cellphones)

fichaPascuas.descripcion: |Tomorrow we will be definitely removing the Ice, Vader Eggs & the Evil Choco Bunny from the catalogue! You're warned :-)

fichaBienvenidoBoombang.descripcion: A unique world full of surprises where you'll have the time of your life: live it!
fichaBienvenidoBoombang.subdescripcion1: Travel and meet people, head to the areas on the left to start!
fichaBienvenidoBoombang.subdescripcion2: Have fun, interact and share exciting adventures with new friends!
fichaBienvenidoBoombang.subdescripcion3: Decorate it with plants, pets, trees, secret hideouts and.. eggs!

fichaPromocionPortales.descripcion: Get an exclusive Magical Portal for free: only this month! How? With any purchase you make above $5 with Ultimate Game Card, Ukash or Credit Card you will receive the Credits PLUS the Magic Portal as a gift!

fichaPromocionHalloween.descripcion: Get an exclusive Jelly Spider for free: only this month! How? With any purchase you make from $10 or more with Ultimate Game Card, Ukash or Credit Card you will receive the Credits PLUS the Spider as a gift!

fichaPromocionCalabaza.descripcion: Get your huge Pumpkin Mansion, only during this 2 weeks, with a special 50% discount! And get ready to receive an unexpected visit.... (youre warned!)

fichaPromocionPreciosEnero.descripcion: January Sales are here! Get your favorite objects now with a 50% discount!

fichaRebajasEnero.texto0: During Friday, Saturday and Sunday you will be able to compete for 75 Creds!
fichaRebajasEnero.texto4: Special offer only this Weekend!|Sales will be gone on Monday ;)

fichaVarias.sanValentinTexto1: Valentine's Day special edition: only available in the catalogue during 2 weeks!
fichaVarias.sanValentinTexto2: You will only be able to open this gift box after Valentine's Day: give it to somebody that's special for you!
fichaVarias.cienCreditosPlataDesc: With Silver Coins you can purchase lots of objects for free from our catalogue to decorate your island!|Each time you log to your account you wil get some free Silver Coins!
fichaVarias.halloweenTexto2: The Wicked Box and the Cursed Box. Open to get terrifically beautiful items!
fichaVarias.halloweenLlavesTexto0: Click on it to get|the broken key.|you need 2 parts
fichaVarias.halloweenLlavesTexto3: he will give|you the full|halloween|key for your|room
fichaVarias.halloweenObjetosTitulo: New key and Silver Coin Items!
fichaVarias.halloweenObjetosTexto0: Unlock a new door in your house with the wooden key you'll find in the catalogue and try the new items!
fichaVarias.halloweenPocionesTexto0: Visit the witch in the Crypt,|try the new potions!
fichaVarias.promoBibliotecaTitulo: Free with Game and Credit Cards!
fichaVarias.promoBibliotecaTexto0: Activate a Game|Card and get this|cute bear as a|christmas gift!
fichaVarias.promoBibliotecaTexto1: How? With any purchase you make of $5 or more with Ultimate Game Card, Ukash or Credit Card you will receive the Credits PLUS the Bear as a gift!
fichaVarias.concursoFacebookTexto0: Become a BoomBang FAN in Facebook!
fichaVarias.concursoFacebookTexto1: What would YOU do for 50 Gold Bags!? Write it in the Wall. The Fans that get more "likes" the 20th of Dec will earn the prize!

bpad.fraceBorrarContacto: Are you sure? Accepting means you'll delete all selected contacts from your B-Pad||Agree?
bpad.fraceEscogeUsuario: Select the user you wish to add to your friend List.||Simply click on the shadow under the user's feet!
bpad.fraceAddUsuario: Done! A message has been sent to this user requesting him to be your friend!||Once he accepts both of you will be able to keep in touch and send messages using the B-Pad!

bpad.noExiste: There's nobody with that name in our Data Base!||Try again! Write another nickname and click on the search button.
bpad.denunciaMensajeTexto: If you have received an offensive message you may report it.||A staff member will recieve a copy of the message, and can take action after reading it; banning the player.||Don't lie or use this tool for fun, you could get banned!
bpad.denunciaEnviadaTexto: Your complaint has been sent! A staff member will investigate and study your case.||If we find your complaint to be justifed we will make sure that player doesn't bother you or others again in the future!||Thanks for helping us keep boombang clean of rotten apples!
bpad.denunciarUsuarioTexto: You may report any player who is harassing you or others, trying to cheat or using foul language.||A staff member will receive a copy of the conversation, and can take action after reading all the evidence.||Don't lie or use this tool for fun, you could get banned!
bpad.denunciarIslaTexto: You may report this Island if you fell offended by its name, areas or description.||A staff member will check the Island and take action, usually deleting the Island and banning its owner´s account.||Don't lie or use this tool for fun you could get banned!

bpad.maxCantidadContactosDelOtro: This user has already reached the maximum number of contacts allowed in his B-Pad!|Remember you can´t have more than 200 friends!

baseChat.password: Attention: never say your password! Don't trust a player who asks your password!
baseChat.cumplido0: NAME you're sweeter than my Diabolic Cotton!
baseChat.cumplido1: NAME you're skin is as soft as my Numbdino :)
baseChat.cumplido2: NAME I feel so happy when I see you, almost as happy as finding a Dino Lee inside my egg!
baseChat.cumplido4: NAME, your eyes sparkle with the intensity of my raresaur's fire
baseChat.cumplido5: NAME; you're as beautiful as Beluga Beach at dusk
baseChat.cumplido6: NAME, I'd rather be with you than alone in my island with all the MODS!
baseChat.cumplido7: NAME, you seem so friendly I deleted a MOD from my PAD to add you :)
baseChat.cumplido8: NAME, my clones will follow you day and night so that nobody else may kiss you!
baseChat.cumplido9: NAME, did you know my password is your name?
baseChat.cumplido10: NAME, did you know I wrote your name with bushes in my island???
baseChat.cumplido11: NAME, I wouldn't trade your friendship, not eve for 1,000 golden eggs
baseChat.cumplido12: NAME, I've begged BoomBang Team for a fanart section exclusively about you!
baseChat.cumplido13: NAME, I've been banned for placing God your name -.-
baseChat.cumplido14: NAME, how can love feel so REAL if this is a VIRTUAL world?=
baseChat.cumplido15: NAME, whenever I see you my internet conection goes dead!
baseChat.cumplido16: NAME, I am even jealous of my avatar, after all he is the one kissing you :)
baseChat.cumplido18: NAME - My parrot whispers your name every time I go to my island
baseChat.cumplido19: NAME - My heart beats faster and stronger when I see you: Boom-Bang, Boom-Bang
baseChat.cumplido20: NAME - Is there a cheat or hack I can use to win your heart?
baseChat.cumplido21: NAME, I scream as loud as a Rexie when your avatar accepts somebody elses kiss :/
baseChat.cumplido22: NAME, I could spend all day thinking on a compliment for you, but none will make you justice
baseChat.cumplido23: NAME I'd bann everybody in BoomBang so that we could be alone and together!
baseChat.cumplido24: NAME Playing BoomBang was only worth it because I got to meet you
baseChat.cumplido25: NAME I keep opening Rare in a Row hoping to find you inside
baseChat.cumplido26: NAME I bathed in shifting gum so that when I hug you you wouldn't be able to leave me!
baseChat.cumplido27: NAME Look at my stats: just 1 kiss, the one I gave you!
baseChat.cumplido28: NAME My tears float down like sakura leaves whenever youre not with me
baseChat.cumplido29: NAME You're the only reason I log to BoomBang each day
baseChat.cumplido30: NAME I'll do anything for you, even cancel my account ;S
baseChat.cumplido31: NAME Does your heart have a password?
baseChat.cumplido32: NAME I would remove my Royal Art Egg's crown so that you can wear it
baseChat.cumplido33: NAME I doubted love at first sight existed, until I met you!
baseChat.cumplido34: NAME When ever I see you I tremble more than Christmas reindeers
baseChat.cumplido35: NAME I've declined being a MOD, I wouldnt have time to be with you :)
baseChat.cumplido36: NAME Your friendship is everlasting just like the raresaur roar, bold and fierce but somehow sweet.
baseChat.cumplido37: NAME I wouldn't risk losing you, even for 10 million bags of gold creds
baseChat.cumplido38: NAME Even the ladybird in Flower Power admires your beauty
baseChat.cumplido39: NAME Your kisses are sweeter than the blackberries on my wild hedge
baseChat.cumplido40: NAME You're as special as my first day in BoomBang
baseChat.cumplido41: NAME, I like you so much I would leave the Ring for you... even If I only had one vic left for golden :'$
baseChat.cumplido42: NAME, My love is so strong that I got hacked 15 times, and I kept creating accounts just to be with you.
baseChat.cumplido43: NAME, I didn't click on a Gold Chest to give you a kiss instead.
baseChat.cumplido44: NAME, My love for you is as big as a house made with BBox.
baseChat.cumplido45: NAME, An unwatered Ant Tree only lasts one day, but our love will last a lifetime.
baseChat.cumplido46: NAME, If I lose you, I'd feel as if I had been scammed a Chocobunny 1.
baseChat.cumplido47: NAME, My love for you is as big as the head of the DJ.
baseChat.cumplido48: NAME, Your sexy votes are wrong. They should be infinity.
baseChat.cumplido49: NAME, I love you so much I would fly with you in the Love Globe until the end of the world.
baseChat.cumplido50: NAME, You are more beautiful than watching the sunrise from the top of Vertigo.

compraCreditos.descripcionCompraCreditos: With credits you can purchase virtual objects for your island and much more!

intercambios.descripcionMia: Open your Backpack and click on the items you want to swap
intercambios.descripcionOtro: Check the boxes below: the items you see will be yours after the transaction ends
intercambios.descripcionTenCuidado: It seems you are giving more items than you are receiving.. are you sure you want to complete this trade? Remember:
intercambios.bullet1TenCuidado: It is not possible to clone items, don't let people scam you
intercambios.bullet2TenCuidado: If someone trades you a rare item, make sure its there

creacionObjetos.descHelp: How to move around and what to do:||-Explore the graveyard: walk with your avatar until you are on top of a stone with an arrow. That way you will pass on to the next area and get deeper inside the graveyard.||-Gather the stuff you find while exploring, step on top of the desired item to send it to your backpack. Tip: search also in tombstones and removed earth!||Happy Halloween!
creacionObjetos.descHelpGnomo: How does it work?||-Simply gather the snowballs you see on the ground!||-The Yeti will be able to craft a Giant Snow Avatar for you||-Don't worry it won't melt!
creacionObjetos.descHelpPascuas: -Find the 4 Easter Bunnies in Boombang!||-The chocolate chests contain coins you may use to trade with the Easter Bunnies to get special exclusive items.||-You can also try to gather the 36 pieces and build the Great B'n'W Egg, it won't be easy!
creacionObjetos.descHelpBruja: -Get the ingredients for the potions in the cemetery||-You can only have one potion active.||-Happy Halloween
creacionObjetos.descHelpZombie: -You've caught the Shy Zombie unaware: Empty his pockets before he vanishes once more in the graveyard shadows!
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcCrypta: -With the Ghoul's help you will be able to mend your Halloween Key and even bring Frankenstein back to life: search on the graveyard!||-Don't delay yourself too much inside the Crypt... I believe the Ghoul is eyeing you suspiciously, and its lunch time ;)
creacionObjetos.descripcionErrorCostumeInicio: This object has already been created.
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcBondadoso: ||Walking through the snowy forest, you'll see gifts in the snow, keep them as you used to do trade with the goblins and get things in return.
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcPastelero: ||Walking through the snowy forest, you'll see gifts in the snow, keep them as you used to do trade with the goblins and get things in return.
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcSanta: Santa needs as many presents as you can find; walk around the White Forest to get them, and bring them back to Santa, he will give you some well deserved rewards!
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcNieve: This elf has a talent: |bring him some snowballs and a few credits and he will create amazing snow sculptures and other snow artifacts!
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcCupido: Just for Valentine's Day.| You can get into the daily gift box the 2 parts that make up the key to your room of Valentin's Day. Give me both sides and i will give you the complete key!
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcWoody: Help cleaning the Burrow out of mushrooms, bring them to Woody and he'll give you funny objects.
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcYoga: Help cleaning the Burrow out of mushrooms, bring them to Elph and he'll give you funny objects.
creacionObjetos.descHelpNpcAmphibia: What happened? A bright light shone in the sky followed by a strong sound. Seems like we are being invaded by aliens from another planet.|What should we do? Maybe they come in peace, or they are agressive... Or there are both kinds.|Right now, someone is asking for your help to repair her ship. Will you help her?

helpManager.fraseWelcome: Welcome, check out this fast tutorial|and learn how to decorate your island!
helpManager.fraseConsigueMonedas: It will only take 1 minute and you|will get some free silver coins as a gift :)
helpManager.fraseAbreMochila: Open the BackPack (click on it) and|check what items you have inside
helpManager.fraseObjectsWin: Te hemos regalado algunos objetos |para decorar tu isla!
helpManager.fraseDragObjects: Drag them from the BackPack into your|island. Place them wherever you want
helpManager.frasePressTractor: You can change an Item's Color: Click|first on the yellow machine to the left
helpManager.frasePressTractorOk: Great! The Icon is 'blinking'|this means you are now in EDIT MODE
helpManager.fraseSelectObject: Now select any item or object|in your island by clicking on it
helpManager.fraseDescPanelSelObject: This panel presents all the options|you may customize for the selected item
helpManager.fraseCambiaColor: Choose new colors: click on the Brush|Icon and select what parts to change
helpManager.fraseCambiaColorOK: Excellent! From this panel you may|alter color, size and edit options for items
helpManager.frasePressTractorFinish: Finished? Remember to click again on|the yellow machine to leave Edit Mode
helpManager.fraseFinModoEdicion: Good! You are on Normal Mode again|and can walk with your avatar
helpManager.fraseWinMonedasPlata: You will now receive some free|silver coins as a gift!
helpManager.fraseDescWinMonedasPlata: It is easy to earn many more Silver|Coins each day. How? ||-Every 15 min of playtime! (up to 2h)|-Inviting your friends|-Participate in contests / quizz|-Catching some chests|-etc!
helpManager.fraseOpenCatalogo: Open the Catalogue box and decide|what to buy with your coins!
helpManager.fraseOpenCatalogo2: Click on the red box with stars|to your left to open your catalogue
helpManager.fraseAhorra: No es necesario que gastes ahora|tus|monedas! Puedes ahorrar
helpManager.fraseMuchosObjetos: There's many objects and pets you|may decorate your island with!
helpManager.fraseInvitaAmigos: And remember you can create many|more Islands and invite your friends!

orientInsense.frase0: Orange blossom: the scent of these delicate white petals captivate your imagination.
orientInsense.frase1: Lavender: the scent fills the air with tranquility and peace...sweet dreams!
orientInsense.frase2: Sandalwood: a warm, soft, gentle and sweet woody fragrance arouses.
orientInsense.frase3: Vanilla: the fresh and vital scent arouses inspiration and creativity.
orientInsense.frase4: Cinamon: this special scent creates a bridge between sweet and sour, harmonising your mood.
orientInsense.frase5: Rose: fresh and sweet, the rose petal scent attracts love and creates a charming mood.
orientInsense.frase6: Jasmine: the fragrance transports you to an exotic place where stillness and peace reign.
orientInsense.frase7: Patchouli:the heavy and strong scent disperses scattered thinking and makes you feel good

fichaAyudaCodigo.item4: Make sure you are not blocking our emails: look in Options / Safe and Blocked Senders

multiplayerGames.descAviso: Get ready, the game will start soon!.||You will be automatically summoned in 10 seconds.||Your opponents are already waiting for you.

mGameRing.descBienvenido: Are you ready to challenge other players? Check the rules, defeat your rivals, earn fame and prizes!
mGameRing.descReglas0: In this game you will fight against 7 other players that will try to defeat you as fast as possible.
mGameRing.descReglas1: Sign up for the Tournament with credits and win to get a prize.|Or practice for free using Silver coins.
mGameRing.descReglas2: You will be summoned 60 seconds before the game starts, so you'll have time to intimidate your opponents xD
mGameRing.descReglas3: It doesn't really matter how many opponents you defeat, the winner will be the 'last man standing'
mGameRing.descReglas4: You will be able to throw up to 3 free coconuts to block other players!
mGameRing.descReglas5: Prizes? Depending on the number of Tournaments you win you'll earn a new glove with a different color!
mGameRing.descReglas6: There are several different colors you can achieve, some will require a few wins, others a lifetime..
mGameRing.descReglas7: Remember, only the last player standing will win!
mGameRing.descAceptarInscripcion: El próximo torneo comenzará muy pronto. Si me das 250 monedas de oro te inscribiré y serás convocado.
mGameRing.descAbandonado: You're weaker than I thought... Come back when you're ready!
mGameRing.descEsperar: Just go and stretch your legs a bit, don't worry, I will summon you before the tournament starts
mGameRing.descPracticar: Puedes practicar a cambio de 1 moneda de plata.|No podrás conseguir un guante de color practicando.
mGameRing.descCreditosInsuficientes: I have a feeling youre trying to trick me... you don't have the necessary Credits to sign up for the Tournament!
mGameRing.descCreditosInsuficientesPlata: I have a feeling youre trying to trick me.. you don't have the necessary Silver Coins to sign!
mGameRing.descInscripcionOk: You have signed up for the game. Get ready, I will summon you automatically before the challenge starts!
mGameRing.descRecuerda: Only the last player standing will win!
mGameRing.tituloAbandonar: The game is not ready yet..
mGameRing.descAbandonar: Have a little patience! Its not easy to find rivals willing to challenge you, you will be summoned when everybody is ready.
mGameRing.descError: Im afraid there has been a system error... nothing serious don't worry; just try again please!
mGameRing.descFichaPunch: Con cada Victoria consigue 500 Créditos y estos guantes de colores

mGameCocos.descBienvenido: Hi little human, we invite you to participate in a very special game. We will test your speed and wits, do you accept?
mGameCocos.descReglas0: In this game you'll play against 5 other players. Think fast, move faster and you'll be the winner!
mGameCocos.descReglas1: Every 30 seconds and at my signal, monkeys will throw some coconuts. Walk to a 'safe spot' to avoid getting hit by one.
mGameCocos.descReglas2: 'Safe spots' will be highlighted on the ground before each round, make sure to memorize them and run fast!
mGameCocos.descReglas3: Each round there will be fewer 'safe spots' until the find round, where only 1 'safe spot' will be available.
mGameCocos.descReglas4: If you don't reach a 'safe spot' in time before the countdown a monkey will throw a coconut to you, and you'll be disqualified!
mGameCocos.descReglas5: You can use 2 coconuts to delay your opponents, make sure you use them wisely!
mGameCocos.descAceptarInscripcion: The game will start soon enough, but if you want|to participate you should give me 250 Credits!
mGameCocos.descAbandonado: Oh... come on little one, why are you leaving? I was secretly hoping to throw some coconuts to you :) See you around!
mGameCocos.descEsperar: Just go and stretch your legs a bit, don't worry, I will summon you before the tournament starts
mGameCocos.descPracticar: You may practice for 1 silver coins.|You can only win a Treasure Chest on Tournament mode.
mGameCocos.descCreditosInsuficientes: Even though I'm a monkey, it seems I'm better at maths than you are: you don't have enough Credits!
mGameCocos.descCreditosInsuficientesPlata: I have a feeling youre trying to trick me.. you don't have the necessary Silver Coins to sign!
mGameCocos.descInscripcionOk: Ok you've signed up; I will summon you when the game is ready, you can go elsewhere in the meantime.
mGameCocos.descRecuerda: Reach the safe spots fast and delay your friends with coconuts!
mGameCocos.descAbandonar: Its not the time yet! Don't worry, you signed up, I will tell you when the game is ready!
mGameCocos.descError: Im afraid there has been a system error... nothing serious don't worry; just try again please!
mGameCocos.descFichaCocos: Con cada Victoria consigue 500 Créditos y estos cocos

mGameLianas.descBienvenido: Are you brave enough to travel through the jungle path filled with 1000 invisible vines?
mGameLianas.descReglas0: In this adventure, you'll complete against 2 opponents. You'll attempt to walk and reach the cross without springing a trap.
mGameLianas.descReglas1: Seems easy? There is only one correct path :). Only a brave tracker will make it to the end without failing.
mGameLianas.descReglas2: Check where other adventurers step and where there are traps.
mGameLianas.descReglas3: One simple mistake or false step and you'll go to the initial position! Make it to the cross and win 100 credits per opponent
mGameLianas.descAceptarInscripcion: Want to compete? You need: 100 credits.|If you win you'll get: 200 credits + Treasure Chest
mGameLianas.descAbandonado: Today you've escaped from our traps, but I never forget a face, soon we will meet again.
mGameLianas.descEsperar: Just go and stretch your legs a bit, don't worry, I will summon you before the tournament starts
mGameLianas.descPracticar: You may practice for 1 silver coins.|You can only win a Treasure Chest on Tournament mode.
mGameLianas.descCreditosInsuficientes: Even with the paint on my face I can see you don't carry the necessary Credits to Compete!
mGameLianas.descCreditosInsuficientesPlata: I have a feeling youre trying to trick me.. you don't have the necessary Silver Coins to sign!
mGameLianas.descInscripcionOk: Get ready: focus and sharpen your senses, I'll summon you automatically when more players sign up!
mGameLianas.descRecuerda: The fastest to get to the cross will win the prize!
mGameLianas.descAbandonar: You can't start this adventure alone: I'll summon you when everybody is ready, you can go elsewhere in the meantime.
mGameLianas.descError: Im afraid there has been a system error... nothing serious don't worry; just try again please!

mGameShuriken.descBienvenido: To become a true Ninja you will need to follow and complete the Crane path. Are you ready?
mGameShuriken.descReglas0: In this game, you'll compete against 4 friends. Prove your speed and intuition throwing ninja stars to evil ninjas!
mGameShuriken.descReglas1: Aim with your mouse and shoot a star by pressing your mouse button.
mGameShuriken.descReglas2: Your avatar will shoot a shuriken ONLY if you are the fastest player to succesfully aim and press your mouse button!
mGameShuriken.descReglas3: Make sure you only shoot at evil ninjas, you will get negative points if you shoot against innocent passers by.
mGameShuriken.descReglas4: The first player to reach 200 points will win. All the players will gain some progress and points to become a true Ninja.
mGameShuriken.descReglas5: Black Ninja: 5 pts / Red Ninja: 10 pts / Special Ninja: 15 pts|Innocent: -20 pts
mGameShuriken.descAceptarInscripcion: Want to compete? You need: 100 credits.|Playing will make you advance to become a Ninja
mGameShuriken.descAbandonado: When you make up your mind and decide to continue The Way of the Crane come to me.
mGameShuriken.descEsperar: I'm still trying to find more players: I'll summon you when everybody is ready, you can go elsewhere in the meantime.
mGameShuriken.descPracticar: You may practice for 1 silver coins.|You won't be able to become a Ninja in Practice Mode.
mGameShuriken.descCreditosInsuficientes: A ninja must show cunning, but you forget who I am:|you don't have enough Credits to Compete!
mGameShuriken.descCreditosInsuficientesPlata: You don't have enough silver coins to practice!
mGameShuriken.descInscripcionOk: Today your Ninja abilities will increase. I will summon you when the game is ready.
mGameShuriken.descRecuerda: only the first player to aim correctly will shoot the shuriken star.
mGameShuriken.descAbandonar: The way of the Crane requires speed and intuition, but also discipline, today you've showed you lack all of them..
mGameShuriken.descError: Im afraid there has been a system error... nothing serious don't worry; just try again please!
